channel.title: Things 3 on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Things 3 on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Things 3.22 Introduces Refreshed Interface and More
item.description: Cultured Code’s Things 3.22 is now available with comprehensive support for iOS 26 and Apple’s other major software updates, introducing a redesigned interface and a range of enhancements. Things 3.22
